languages.text: Говорящий-со-Звездами, жрец найденного Вольным Торговцем поселения, мог бы провести ритуал усмирения леса, однако был призван Каллигосом Винтерскейлом на службу и сгинул вместе с ним.

traits.locale_text: Население Кетца-аль Хета веками выживало в лесах благодаря особым ритуалам. Говорящий-со-Звездами, жрец найденного Вольным Торговцем поселения, мог бы провести ритуал усмирения леса, однако был призван Каллигосом Винтерскейлом на службу и сгинул вместе с ним.

languages.text: Speaks-With-Gods, a priest from the settlement that the Rogue Trader has discovered, may be able to perform a ritual that would tame the forest, but he was called into service by Calligos Winterscale and disappeared along with him.
languages.original_text: Говорящий-со-Звездами, жрец найденного Вольным Торговцем поселения, мог бы провести ритуал усмирения леса, однако был призван Каллигосом Винтерскейлом на службу и сгинул вместе с ним.

languages.text: Parle-aux-Dieux, un prêtre du village découvert par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, pourrait accomplir un rituel pour dompter la forêt, mais il a été réquisitionné par Calligos Winterscale et a disparu avec lui.
languages.original_text: Speaks-With-Gods, a priest from the settlement that the Rogue Trader has discovered, may be able to perform a ritual that would tame the forest, but he was called into service by Calligos Winterscale and disappeared along with him.

traits.locale_text: Parle-aux-Dieux, un prêtre du village découvert par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, pourrait accomplir un rituel pour dompter la forêt, mais il a été réquisitionné par Calligos Winterscale et a disparu avec lui.

languages.text: “神谕”是一位牧师，居住在行商浪人发现的村庄中。他原本可以举行安抚森林的仪式，但他却被卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔强行征召入伍，一起消失在了森林之中。
languages.original_text: Speaks-With-Gods, a priest from the settlement that the Rogue Trader has discovered, may be able to perform a ritual that would tame the forest, but he was called into service by Calligos Winterscale and disappeared along with him.

traits.locale_text: “神谕”是一位牧师，居住在行商浪人发现的村庄中。他原本可以举行安抚森林的仪式，但他却被卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔强行征召入伍，一起消失在了森林之中。

languages.text: 自由開拓者が発見した集落の司祭である神々との語り部であれば、森をなだめる儀式を執り行えるかもしれない。しかし、その者はカリゴス・ウィンタースケールに従うよう召集され、彼とともに姿を消した。
languages.original_text: Speaks-With-Gods, a priest from the settlement that the Rogue Trader has discovered, may be able to perform a ritual that would tame the forest, but he was called into service by Calligos Winterscale and disappeared along with him.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者が発見した集落の司祭である神々との語り部であれば、森をなだめる儀式を執り行えるかもしれない。しかし、その者はカリゴス・ウィンタースケールに従うよう召集され、彼とともに姿を消した。

languages.text: Spricht-mit-den-Göttern, ein Priester aus der Siedlung, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} entdeckt hat, kann den Wald vielleicht durch ein Ritual zähmen. Er wurde aber von Calligos Winterzunder einberufen, ihm zu dienen, und ist mit ihm gemeinsam verschollen.
languages.original_text: Speaks-With-Gods, a priest from the settlement that the Rogue Trader has discovered, may be able to perform a ritual that would tame the forest, but he was called into service by Calligos Winterscale and disappeared along with him.

traits.locale_text: Spricht-mit-den-Göttern, ein Priester aus der Siedlung, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} entdeckt hat, kann den Wald vielleicht durch ein Ritual zähmen. Er wurde aber von Calligos Winterzunder einberufen, ihm zu dienen, und ist mit ihm gemeinsam verschollen.

languages.text: Habla-con-Dioses, un sacerdote del asentamiento que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha descubierto, podría celebrar un ritual que domará el bosque, pero ha sido convocado por Calligos Winterscale y desaparecido junto a él.
languages.original_text: Speaks-With-Gods, a priest from the settlement that the Rogue Trader has discovered, may be able to perform a ritual that would tame the forest, but he was called into service by Calligos Winterscale and disappeared along with him.

traits.locale_text: Habla-con-Dioses, un sacerdote del asentamiento que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha descubierto, podría celebrar un ritual que domará el bosque, pero ha sido convocado por Calligos Winterscale y desaparecido junto a él.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in keşfettiği yerleşim yerlerinden bir rahip olan Tanrıların Dili, ormanı sakinleştirecek bir ayin gerçekleştirebilir. Fakat Calligos Winterscale tarafından göreve çağrılmış ve onunla birlikte ortadan kaybolmuş.
languages.original_text: Speaks-With-Gods, a priest from the settlement that the Rogue Trader has discovered, may be able to perform a ritual that would tame the forest, but he was called into service by Calligos Winterscale and disappeared along with him.
